price: Чынында, Биз асманда топ жылдыздарды жаратып, аларды көрүүчүлөр үчүн зыйнат кылып койдук.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jaʿalnā fī al-samāi burūjan wazayyannāhā lilnnāẓirīna
